## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MON1</u>
- **Gene Name:** MONENSIN SENSITIVITY1
- **Description:**   SAND family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2057552
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
